author: USA TODAY, Sara M Moniuszko, USA TODAY
title: Idris Elba shares coronavirus health update, says he's 'stuck in limbo' after quarantine period
description: Idris Elba is sharing a health update after revealing he tested positive for coronavirus on March 16. He also explains why he's stuck in limbo.
content:
Idris Elba, Tom Hanks and Rita Wilson are among some of the high-profile names who have tested positive for coronavirus.
